##### **Journal of Experimental Biology - Outside JEB**

------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following articles are published in the **Journal of Experimental Biology** as part of [**Outside JEB**](https://journals.biologists.com/jeb/pages/article-types). Outside JEB is a monthly feature in JEB of short articles covering recent research papers published in other journals. Check it out!

##### **Marshmallow Minds**

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am excited to be advising [**Marshmallow Minds**](https://www.marshmallowminds.org/) on their upcoming curriculum, **"A tough trek, salmon migration in a changing planet"**. Marshmallow Minds mission statement: "Marshmallow Minds is a 501(c)(3) public benefit nonprofit organization with the mission to make future-ready, highly engaging, and experiential education easily accessible and very affordable for Title-1 schools that serve children from under-resourced communities." Check out their website to learn more about their mission and ongoing projects!
